mapper.select: SELECT RASMBLY_ID /* '지방의회_ID'*/ , SET_INTERVAL /* '요청시간간격'*/ , INSTALL_YEAR /* '설치년도'*/ , SERVER /* '서버명'*/ , OS /* 'OS명'*/ , WAS /* 'WAS명'*/ , CPU /* 'CPU명'*/ , RAM /* 'RAM명'*/ , MODULE_INSTALL_PATH /* '모듈설치경로'*/ , NOTE /* '비고'*/ , REQ_PROCESSING_RATIO /* '요청처리율'*/ , LAST_CNTC_DT FROM COLGOVER_SET, COLGOVER WHERE COLGOVER.RASMBLY_ID = COLGOVER_SET.RASMBLY_ID AND RASMBLY_ID = #RASMBLY_ID# AND LAST_CNTC_DT BETWEEN #STARTDATE# AND #ENDDATE#
